responses: Preventions that you must follow: Wash your hands regularly, Avoid touching your face, Clean frequently used surfaces, Use hand sanitizers. SUGGESTED FOODS ARE: Garlic, Vitamin C containing fruits, Leafy greens, Broccoli, Oatmeal, Spices, Chicken Soup
